p.q: First, Karina wants to activate her students' prior knowledge on that topic. Given the teacher's purpose, which of the following activities is least appropriate?

as.a: Play a video about free time activities people usually do. Tell the students to identify the names of those activities and write them down in their notebooks. Call on some volunteers to share their answers
Write "free time activities" on the board and tell the students to think of all the words they can relate to that phrase. Invite some students to go to the board and write the words they thought of.
Show the students some pictures of free time activities. Ask the students which of those activities and/or others they do in their free time. Have them exchange ideas and then call on volunteers.
